revised_title: The Art of Razor Sharpening and Maintenance
tldr: The author, Antony Van Leeuwenhoek, shares his personal experience and techniques for maintaining and sharpening razors. He explains how to prepare a leather strop using tripoly and emery, and how to use a microscope to observe the notches in the razor edge. He also discusses the properties of steel and the importance of fine particles in creating a sharp edge. This knowledge can help improve the performance of razors and maintain their sharpness.
